recap_documents.description: MEMORANDUM OPINION AND ORDER granting in part, denying in part and dismissing without prejudice in part  263  Second Amended Motion Under 2255 to Vacate, Set Aside or Correct Sentence filed by Angela Jane Johnson.  See text of Order. Re spondent shall have sixty days to notify the court and the petitioner whether it will demand a new hearing to determine the penalty for Johnson's convictions or will, instead, withdraw the notice of intent to seek the death penalty and allow the  court to set a hearing to impose sentences of life imprisonment without parole on the convictions on Counts 6 through 10.  Signed by Judge Mark W Bennett on 3/22/12.  (djs) (Main Document 377 replaced due to typo and NEF regenerated on 4/3/2012) (djs).
